ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of mushroom soup
1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste
des: "This easy gravy recipe will fool everyone into thinking it simmered all day!"
ins: Whisk together the mushroom soup, beef gravy, and Marsala wine in a saucepan. Bring to a simmer over medium heat and cook for 10 minutes, whisking frequently. Season to taste with kosher salt before serving.
